summary: This document details the activities of Ramon Joseph ALVAREZ Durant and related personnel involved in Project LIEMPTY, a photo surveillance operation targeting the Soviet Embassy from 1955 to 1972. It outlines ALVAREZ's role as a cutout and photo technician, as well as the involvement of other individuals like Hester ROOS (LIEMPTY-19), Oliver G. SCANTLING (Juan N. FRAIS-RAMIRRZ), and Jorge Barcello VILLAGRAn Alvarez (LIEMPTY-6). The report also describes the setup and function of the various basehouses (LIMITED, LILYRIC, LICALLA) used for surveillance.
title: Ramon Joseph ALVAREZ Durant and Project LIEMPTY Operations
